1. download and install the deamon tools from the its site as s.o has mentioned above. The installing process would require you to reboot
2. use deamon tools to mount the first CD, use the serial number in the text file in the same folder you have downloaded your torrent.
3. mount the second CD in order to run your Tell Me More - German etc.
